title: Adrianna Dresser
description:
The Adrianna dresser rests on a metal base with two lower shelves. The upper portion is constructed of wood in a walnut finish. Three lower drawers are accented with metal bar pulls and the top two drawers have mirrored fronts with round pulls. Choose to add the optional baskets for the shelves or keep them open for display.
